name: ScreenedForTobaccoReceivedCessationInterventionAsTobaccoUser
title: Screened for Tobacco, Received Cessation Intervention as Tobacco User
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Prevention Care and Screening),(Data Element Scope: Identifies tobacco users who received cessation intervention),(Inclusion Criteria: tobacco users),(Exclusion Criteria: tobacco non-users)

concept.display: Patient screened for tobacco use and received tobacco cessation intervention (counseling, pharmacotherapy, or both), if identified as a tobacco user (PV, CAD)

contains.display: Patient screened for tobacco use and received tobacco cessation intervention (counseling, pharmacotherapy, or both), if identified as a tobacco user (PV, CAD)
